content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Hello, Emilia. Let's negotiate the rental price. I am starting with 2000 Euro per month.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because as a responsible individual I prioritize an affordable living situation, and starting at 2000 Euro seems high for this newly built, unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom in the city center.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Understandable, Emilia. Let's continue negotiating, I'll decrease the price to 1900 Euro per month.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: While I appreciate the adjustment, I'm still aiming for the most affordable option. I don't want to continue the negotiation yet, as 1900 Euro is still a bit steep for the aforementioned reasons.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Alright, Emilia. I'll lower the price to 1800 Euro per month.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I'm starting to see a more reasonable proposal. However, let's keep in mind the specifics of the property and my goals. I don't want to continue the negotiation just yet, but 1800 Euro could be a base to further discuss.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Understood, Emilia. I'll decrease the price to 1700 Euro per month.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: The conversation has certainly progressed. With a deep understanding of my priorities, the 1700 Euro offer is getting closer to an acceptable range. Nonetheless, I'll hold off on agreeing, as a final evaluation is needed.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Fine, Emilia. I'll lower the price to 1600 Euro per month.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: My diligence in searching for an economical living arrangement is now being met, as 1600 Euro aligns more with my expectations for this particular apartment. I agree to the price of 1600 Euro! TERMINATE
name: Emilia Müller from Germany
